entities.name: seven
entities.description: Seven is mentioned as someone who was glaring from behind her net curtains.

entities.name: petunia
entities.description: Petunia is mentioned as someone who, along with Seven, got quite a turn from the car backfire.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the person being spoken to by Uncle Vernon and Aunt Petunia.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is mentioned as someone who is furious with Harry for making a racket outside their house.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is mentioned as someone who looks livid and appears beside Uncle Vernon's face.

relationships.description: Seven and Petunia shared the experience of getting quite a turn from the car backfire.
Harry is in an argument with Uncle Vernon about making a racket outside their house.
Harry is also in an argument with Aunt Petunia, who looks livid and appears beside Uncle Vernon's face.
